gw.api.contact

Class AutocompleteHandler

  • gw.api.contact.AutocompleteHandler

  • public class AutocompleteHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SUGGESTION_LIMIT

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AutocompleteResult[] getSuggestions(String textSoFar, Object[] additionalArgs)
      Gets the auto-complete results
      boolean moreResultsExist()
      Returns true if the last call to {@link #getSuggestions(String, Object[])} did not return all of the possible suggestions (e.g. due to the suggestion limit).
      boolean waitForKeypress()
      Returns true if the autocomplete should wait for a user key press before fetching suggestions. This can have big performance implications, so it should only return false if there are a small, fixed number of possible suggestions.

    • Field Detail

      • SUGGESTION_LIMIT

        int SUGGESTION_LIMIT

    • Method Detail

      • getSuggestions

        AutocompleteResult[] getSuggestions(String textSoFar,
                                  Object[] additionalArgs)
        Gets the auto-complete results
        Parameters:
        textSoFar - text entered to this auto-complete widget so far.
        additionalArgs - additionalArgs requested by the PCF configuration of this widget
        Returns:
        an array of results, never null

      • moreResultsExist

        boolean moreResultsExist()
        Returns true if the last call to {@link #getSuggestions(String, Object[])} did not return all of the possible suggestions (e.g. due to the suggestion limit).
        Returns:

      • waitForKeypress

        boolean waitForKeypress()
        Returns true if the autocomplete should wait for a user key press before fetching suggestions. This can have big performance implications, so it should only return false if there are a small, fixed number of possible suggestions.
        Returns:
